kw.name: Given I have a valid API key

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Then Then response body should not be empty
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
